items.name: Skateboard Victory Badge
items.description: A badge made for you by a crust punk to commemorate your skateboard victory. Made with bitter tears.

items.name: Longboard Style Badge
items.description: A badge made by a crust punk to commemorate your beautious longboard style. Made with tears of admiration.

items.name: Rollblade Movie-Straight-to-TV Badge
items.description: A badge made by a crust punk to commemorate your tie against him via rollerblades. Made with tears of movie nostalgia.

items.name: Binary Code on Slip of Paper
items.description: A mysterious binary code hastily scrawled on some lined paper. A recognizable seal is stamped on the bottom.
